name: you are loved - silver bear necklace.
description:
a lovely detailed bear charm necklace with beautiful crystal accenting this delicate piece.

bear charm is approx. 1.5 inch tall and hangs on a 18" silver chain ~ can be adjusted to an 20" chain or 24" chain - just let me know which you prefer at checkout.

lobster clasp.

::

thanks for stopping by!
